title: The Wizard of No
creator_contributor_role: J Gary Mitchell Film Company, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Youth - Alcohol use
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Youth - Drug use
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Youth - Tobacco use

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Substance abuse - Prevention
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Advertising - Social aspects
description: Thirteen-year-old Billy is not the most popular boy in class. The Wizard of No suggests that his lack of popularity is directly related to his inability to say "no". Points out that the word "no" has both a positive and a negative sense. Follows on with advertising and drug education segments.
